name: REsolution -Real-time RPG where a hero is played with an abnormal condition in a different world-

description:
Equipped with more than 50 types of abnormal conditions!
All the CG that was violated is animated!

24 types of battle characters + 28 types of animation + difference

--- This is a game ---

It's a real-time RPG with a dramatic increase in abnormal conditions and a very easy loss!
Of course, if you leave the abnormal condition unattended, you will be defeated!
The destination of defeat is reverse rape without reversal!
It will be squeezed by monster girls and those who should have been friends!
Use a large number of weapons, equipment, and skills to confront!

--- Synopsis ---

A brave party that defeated the Demon King.
However, the Demon King left a curse on the heroes.
While searching for a way to break the curse, the brave men wander into another world.
The different world is a different world that fulfills your wishes.
However, only one person can grant his wish.
In order to break everyone's curse, the hero fights against monster girls and those who were friends ...
